mapper.update: update tb_resource set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_ids = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, available = #{available,jdbcType=TINYINT}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, type, url, parent_id, parent_ids, permission, available, icon from tb_resource
